title: Storefront top notice + remove email from UI

requirements.summary: Add a top-of-page notice banner above the existing header with the exact updates message.
acceptanceCriteria: When the page first loads, the notice is visible without any user interaction and appears above the existing header content.
The notice text matches exactly: “Customers will receive updates when the product drops and when their preorder has been shipped.”
The notice is shown on the main storefront page (the single product page).

file_operations.description: Insert a full-width notice bar as the first rendered element inside the top-level container (above the existing header) with the exact required text, styled with existing Tailwind classes so it is clearly visible on first load.

requirements.summary: Ensure the specified email address is not present in any user-facing UI strings, including the Cash App instructions modal.
acceptanceCriteria: The string “sincerelykilla@icloud.com” does not appear anywhere in the rendered UI.
No new UI elements are added that show an email address.

file_operations.description: Audit all user-facing strings in the storefront page (header/main/footer) and remove/replace any occurrence of “sincerelykilla@icloud.com” so it is never rendered.
Audit all modal copy and remove/replace any occurrence of “sincerelykilla@icloud.com” so the email address is not shown anywhere in the Cash App instructions modal.
